properties.description: Catalyst Center site ID for claiming device

properties.name: CCC PnP Device ID
properties.description: Catalyst Center PnP device ID for claiming

properties.name: Tenant Name
properties.description: NetBox tenant name to filter devices

Claims switches in Catalyst Center via Plug and Play (PnP) based on NetBox data.

Workflow:
1. Gets planned devices from NetBox (filtered by tenant and status)
2. Gets MGMT VLAN information
3. For each device:
   - Extracts device info (serial, hostname, PID, site, template)
   - Gets uplink interface info
   - Builds site path (Global/Tenant/Region/Site/Location)
   - Calculates IP settings (IP, subnet mask, gateway)
   - Claims device via Catalyst Center PnP API
   - Polls for provisioning completion
   - Updates NetBox device status to active

Prerequisites:
- Devices must exist in NetBox with status 'planned'
- Devices must have custom fields: ccc_pid, ccc_template_name, ccc_location, ccc_ip
- Interfaces must have label 'Uplink' for uplink detection
- MGMT VLAN must exist in NetBox
- Site hierarchy must exist in Catalyst Center
Get Tenant ID based on Tenant Name
Get all devices with specified tenant and status

actions.name: Execute Python Script
actions.title: Get Device Count and Store Data

properties.display_name: Get Device Count and Store Data
properties.script:
import json
import sys

devices_json = sys.argv[1]
devices = json.loads(devices_json) if devices_json else []
device_count = len(devices)

print(f"Device count: {device_count}")

actions.name: Set Variables
actions.title: Store Devices Data and Initialize Counters

properties.display_name: Store Devices Data and Initialize Counters

properties.script:
import json
import sys
import ipaddress

devices_json = sys.argv[1]
device_index = int(sys.argv[2])

devices = json.loads(devices_json) if devices_json else []

if device_index < len(devices):
    device = devices[device_index]
    device_name = device.get('name', '')
    serial_number = device.get('serial', '')
    device_id = str(device.get('id', ''))
    
    custom_fields = device.get('custom_fields', {}) or {}
    template_name = custom_fields.get('ccc_template_name', '')
    
    # Get PID from ccc_pid custom field (like Ansible playbook line 60)
    pid = custom_fields.get('ccc_pid', '')
    
    # Get ccc_location custom field for floor (like Ansible playbook line 61)
    location_name = custom_fields.get('ccc_location', '') or ''
    
    # Get ccc_ip custom field for IP calculations (like Ansible playbook lines 72-78)
    ccc_ip = custom_fields.get('ccc_ip', '') or ''
    
    # Get primary_ip4 for SwitchIP (like Ansible playbook line 71)
    # NetBox API returns {address: 'x.x.x.x/24'}, extract just the IP
    primary_ip = device.get('primary_ip4', {}) or {}
    primary_ip_address = primary_ip.get('address', '') if primary_ip else ''
    
    # SwitchIP = just the IP from primary_ip4 (without /mask)
    if primary_ip_address and '/' in primary_ip_address:
        ip_address = primary_ip_address.split('/')[0]
    else:
        ip_address = primary_ip_address
    
    # SubnetMask and Gateway from ccc_ip custom field (CIDR format)
    try:
        network = ipaddress.ip_interface(ccc_ip)
        subnet_mask = str(network.network.netmask)
        gateway = str(list(network.network.hosts())[0])
    except Exception:
        # Fallback: try to calculate from primary_ip4 if ccc_ip not set
        try:
            network = ipaddress.ip_interface(primary_ip_address)
            subnet_mask = str(network.network.netmask)
            gateway = str(list(network.network.hosts())[0])
        except Exception:
            subnet_mask = ''
            gateway = ''
    
    # Get site ID for fetching site details (to get region)
    site = device.get('site', {}) or {}
    site_name = site.get('name', '')
    site_id = str(site.get('id', ''))
    
    tenant = device.get('tenant', {}) or {}
    tenant_name = tenant.get('name', '')

    print(f"Device: {device_name}, IP: {ip_address}, ccc_ip: {ccc_ip}")
else:
    device_name = ''
    serial_number = ''
    device_id = ''
    pid = ''
    template_name = ''
    site_id = ''
    site_name = ''
    location_name = ''
    tenant_name = ''
    ip_address = ''
    subnet_mask = ''
    gateway = ''

print(f"Device: {device_name}, Serial: {serial_number}, Site ID: {site_id}")
